public class PLSQLRuntimeException
extends RuntimeException
This class indicates an exception has occurred in PL/SQL at runtime.

PLSQLRuntimeException(String)
Creates a new PLSQLRuntimeException with the specified detail message

PLSQLRuntimeException 
  public PLSQLRuntimeException(String s)
Creates a new PLSQLRuntimeException with the specified detail message
Parameters:
s - the detail message
